snippet: More than 20 people were apprehended in an investigation into the assault that left 23 people dead on Wednesday.
abstract: Tunisian authorities arrest more than 20 suspected militants in connection with attack at National Bardo Museum in Tunis that left 23 people dead.
lead_paragraph: More than 20 people were apprehended in an investigation into the assault that left 23 people dead on Wednesday.

headline.main: Arrests Made in Attack on Tunisian Museum
headline.print_headline: Arrests Made in Attack on Tunisian Museum
